Subject: Dawn and Greg's Film Roast
Description:
Go to the movies with Dawn and Greg as they add their own special brand of color commentary (a la MST3K) to make a bad movie into a good laugh.   
WARNING: May (OK, WILL) include severe laughter, adult language and off-color jokes.  Not appropriate for young children or those who are easily offended,  Ask your doctor if your heart is healthy enough for sex - if it's not, it probably won't get you through one of our shows, either.  Speakers include:Greg Williams, Dawn Kuczwara  - Track: Film  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Microphone, Projector, Sound System

Subject: So You Want to be a Manager
Description: Ah, the glamorous life of a manager! Or is it? Come hear a few voices 'from the trenches' talk about what it's really like to lead a team, what the job actually entails and some of the horrible - and horribly funny - stories of uncomfortable and embarrassing tasks we as managers have had to complete.  Speakers include:Nuri Gocay, Jer Lance, Dawn Kuczwara, Dave Phillips - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: What Do Your Users Really Think?
Description: The KDE project has released Plasma 5, and with it comes many changes. Come learn what's new in this latest popular open source desktop environment. Whether you're already a KDE user, or just curious about desktops, you will learn something as we run down what's new with an eye to the past. We will also spend some time contrasting the desktop to its competition in Unity and Gnome.  Speakers include:Lana Krolikowski, Aral Balkan, Dawn Kuczwara - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: The Brown Liquors
Description: What's the difference between Bourbon and Scotch? Is Tennessee whiskey any different from Irish? How? Why? Come hear how these different 'Brown Liquors' are made, and what makes them unique from one another. And while your at it, find out for yourself by sampling a little of each.Must be 21+ to participate. Spots are limited - please sign up at Ops!  Speakers include:Dawn Kuczwara, Greg Williams - Track: Food  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: 2014's Con Chair Roast
Description: Our fearless leader has finally found something to fear - a roasting by his friends and underlings! It's probably all in good fun, but don't expect everyone to be sober.  Speakers include:Nuri Gocay, Misha Tuesday, Dawn Kuczwara, James Gamble, Britain Woodman - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Flirting for Geeks
Description: Come learn how to (and how not to) flirt from some of our local fandom's biggest flirts.  Not only is it laugh-out-loud funny, it's an irreverent and honest reflection of love, sex, and fandom. Find ways to woo, methods for making friends, and how to avoid being that creepy guy that we all talk about between conventions.  Speakers include:Greg Williams, Dawn Kuczwara, Nuri Gocay, Bob Waltenspiel, Dave Phillips - Track: After Dark  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
